name: Zephyr (itch) (Vykri)
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for ScoreSpace Jam 12. It includes 6 levels, a global highscore system, and a unique gameplay mechanic.

Controls:

M - Toggle Mute

Mouse / Touch - Draw a line to influence Odysseus' preset path. Once you let go, Odysseus' ship will follow the combined path of his original plan and the way you've blown the wind.

Scoring:

+200 per coin

-100 per kraken hit

+300 per near miss on kraken

+500 for landing on Ithaca (ends the level even if you aren't on the final day)

+1000 for starting a new day. This will decay from +1000 to 0 over the course of 8 seconds after starting to draw your line
